result.purpose: A personalized gift recommendation platform that assists users in finding suitable presents based on recipient profiles and occasions. It leverages external APIs to provide tailored suggestions and enhance the gift-giving experience.
result.architecture: The project follows a modular architecture with a component-based structure typical of React applications, integrating service-oriented patterns for API interactions.

root.purpose: This folder/module is responsible for defining the configuration and dependencies for a React application.
root.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, focusing on configuration management for a React application.

package.json.purpose: Defines the configuration and dependencies for a React application.

src/components.purpose: Contains reusable UI components for the application.
src/components.architecture: Component-based architecture, focusing on reusable UI elements.

src/components/GiftSuggestion.js.purpose: Component for suggesting gifts based on recipient details and occasion.
side_effects: Fetching data from an external API

src/pages.purpose: This folder is responsible for housing the main page components of the application, specifically for user interactions and data collection.
src/pages.architecture: The folder follows a component-based architecture typical of React applications, where each file represents a self-contained component managing its own state and behavior.

src/pages/RecipientProfile.js.purpose: A React component for collecting recipient profile information.
side_effects: Updates state based on user input
Triggers onProfileComplete callback on form submission

src/services.purpose: This folder/module is responsible for providing functions to interact with external APIs related to gift suggestions.
src/services.architecture: The folder follows a service-oriented architecture pattern, encapsulating API interaction logic in dedicated modules.

src/services/giftAPI.js.purpose: This file provides functions to interact with a gift suggestion API, allowing users to fetch gift recommendations, get occasion suggestions, and save favorite gifts.
side_effects: Makes network requests to an external API
risks: Potential exposure of user data if not handled properly
Network errors may lead to unhandled promise rejections
